character.statement: This doesn't look like I expected. It's different, but how?
There! It's been filled in with plaster! Trusty chisel to the rescue again!
You! Because of you, I had to break out of prison to find this safe!
For the last time, I'm not the Booted Bandit!
Maybe the contents of the safe will prove my innocence.
Maybe I do...
Maybe there's something in the prisoner files that can help getting this open...
Don't be so sure, marshal!
I've got some friends with parole hearings coming up. You could put in a good word.
No use for spoon right now.
I've got you now! Wait â€“ two Booted Bandits?
Prove it!
That sounds like a confession to me!
The Booted Bandit won't be seeing the outside of a prison cell for a long, long time.
Sorry about the mix-up. Anything I can do to make it up to you?
Consider it done!
Thanks for doing the grunt work. I'll take it from here...
That's how the cookie crumbles. Now if you'll excuse me, that treasure is mine.
Nice try, but nobody knows the combination except Flashy Fosbury!
At last, Florian's priceless treasure!
What, these are just pictures of Florian, the priceless treasure are just head shots!
Years of search and for this! Arrrgghhh!!!!
